title: Watashi, Dokidoki Renai Kakumei de Onii-chan Yattemasu - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Body Swap   Brother Complex   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Delinquents   Dense Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Female to Male   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Triangles   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Transported Individuals   Naive Protagonist   Otaku   Otome Game   Overprotective Siblings   Persistent Love Interests   Popular Love Interests   Proactive Protagonist   R-15   Reverse Harem   Righteous Protagonist   Sister Complex   Transported into a Game World
author: Tachimori Asahi   日月朝日
description:
I’m a very ordinary girl, with no interest in otome games, but was suddenly sucked into the world of the cliche Heartthrob Love Revolution.

That’s all well and good, I’m not exactly thrilled, but it’s fine. However, why am I the heroine’s older brother? I’m a girl! My character is named Makoto, and I hang out with the Heroine to help her get together with the princely character and make it to the end credits.

All righty, I just need to support the Heroine while she does her best. If I do, I think I’ll be able to go back to my world… but, why am I so popular? Hey, prince, don’t you blush at me!>
